string.text: Haah... medkit... there we go. Not dead yet, not dead yet...
DAMN! I'm going to need another tourniquet soon!
You're not the only one carrying meds, sucker.
Uugh. So much blood. Bandages, bandages, bandages.... whew.
Ghnaaa! Fuck, that's mine. That's my blood. No. Nononononono. Medkit, medkit-medkit! Aaah. Much better.
I don't die so easily, fool!
You made me use my last medkit... I'm going to enjoy stripping your corpse.
Come on, COME ON! I'm going to need another morphine shot!
Ah, hell. My kevlar's almost shredded!
Ngghhh. I'm going to give my medic a kiss if I survive this.
I need more bandages over here!
GAH! Guess those looted meds were good for something after all...
Mmmffffp! Insurance isn't going to cover this...
Just need another shot, just need another shot, just need another shot...
Guess that wasn't my last medkit, after all. I'm still in the fight, sucker!
Unnff. Bandage time. That might've killed me if you could aim worth a damn!
Inghh! Someone pass me another medkit! This one is finished!
A-aaaah-AAAAAAH! Mmmph. Thank God for morphine...
It's going to take more than that to put me down, punk!
AAARGH! Bloody, fu- EERRGHN! Medkit, medkit, medkit. Whew...
You think you're going to bleed me out? Think again.
Armour is still holding, armour is still holding, armour is still holding...
